snippet: Sheriff Lee Baca announced a number of new investigations and changes in Los Angeles County jails, saying he would appoint a special task force to examine dozens of allegations of inmate abuse.
lead_paragraph: Sheriff Lee Baca announced a number of new investigations and changes in Los Angeles County jails, saying he would appoint a special task force to examine dozens of allegations of inmate abuse.

headline.main: Pressed, Sheriff Agrees to Jails Inquiry
headline.print_headline: Pressed, Sheriff Agrees to Jails Inquiry
